channel.title: Need help with ess mines[HELP PLEASE!]
channel.description:
The essence mines dont auto mine only 1 o the 4 rocks work and aubury doesnt tele u there,
and i want it so u need to do that quest, Rune mysteries ;)
please help me,

item.title: Need help with ess mines[HELP PLEASE!]
item.dc:creator: @Wiplayer Wiplayer
item.description:
@Wiplayer wrote:

Try this? Put this

while (invItemSlots > 0) {
        addItem(1436, 1);  
}
if (invItemSlots >= 28) {
        sM("You inventory is full!");
}

under

if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1275) { if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1273); if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1271); if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1269); if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1267); addItem(1436, 1); [br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 21, 2009, 11:47:00 am[/size][hr]Note… updated code… forgot a bracket =/ lol. Fixed now.

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with ess mines[HELP PLEASE!]

item.title: Need help with ess mines[HELP PLEASE!]
item.dc:creator: @baspwnzz baspwnzz
item.description:
@baspwnzz wrote:

This is my script now

	/*
	 * 
	 * MINING
	 * 
	 */
	case 2491:
	pEmote = 0x554;
	if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1275) {
	if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1273);
	if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1271);
	if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1269);
	if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1267);				
	addItem(1436, 1);
	addSkillXP((40*playerLevel[19]), 19);
	sM("You mine some rune essence");
	} else {
	sM("You need a pickaxe to mine.");
	}

break;
case 2108:
case 2109:
startEssMine(2109);
break;

item.title: Need help with ess mines[HELP PLEASE!]
item.dc:creator: @Wiplayer Wiplayer
item.description:
@Wiplayer wrote:

i dont get it to loop....

That’s the best advice I can give you, sorry. =(
The code could be similar to while while (MINING) { keep on mining until full inventory }
You would just need to replace “MINING” with how to check if the action is mining, and if the inventory is free, and add the mining code to mine the rock in 'keep on mining until full inventory".

item.title: Need help with ess mines[HELP PLEASE!]
item.dc:creator: @Wiplayer Wiplayer
item.description:
@Wiplayer wrote:

I’m not trying to flame. There are some people here who will have you figure something out yourself, or some who will guide you through the whole thing. I’m half-and-half. People have given you plenty of tips:

  • Use a loop for auto-mining
  • for the loop, try coding something around the idea “while mining, keep on doing it until inventory is full”
  • Other advice on learning loops.

I’m not trying to flame or give weird answers. Sorry if I am. -.- I’m just giving you ideas for the basics on how to do it.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with ess mines[HELP PLEASE!]
item.dc:creator: @Wiplayer Wiplayer
item.description:
@Wiplayer wrote:

Then google some tut’s or play around with it. Last hint… You will have to make a loop that keeps on mining until the inventory is full. It’s simple. I’m not gonna spoonfeed anymore. The advice on searching for Java looping tuts and the example should be enough.

Good luck.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with ess mines[HELP PLEASE!]
item.dc:creator: @Wiplayer Wiplayer
item.description:
@Wiplayer wrote:

A loop is similiar too…

while ( blah = another_blah ) {
//do stuff
}

and full example would be

while (i <= 20) {
    result = result + i + " squared is " + (i * i) + "\n";
    i++;
}

There’s two example’s of loops. Tailor and experiment with them. I’m not trying to spoonfeed guys, just trying to give examples…

Read full topic

Make quests yourself don’t ask us to do it for you.
